sense.def:
Kdor je
sympathetic to someone
, je prijazen z nekom, ki so ga doletele težave, in pokaže, da razume, kako se ta oseba počuti.

seg.quote: My boyfriend was very sympathetic and it did make me feel better.
She put a hand sympathetically on his arm.

sense.def:
Kdor je
sympathetic to a proposal or action
, odobrava neki predlog ali dejanje in ga je pripravljen podpreti.

seg.quote: He is sympathetic to our cause.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
sympathetic
opišemo osebo, ki nam je všeč in katere vedênje odobravamo.

seg.quote: I found him a very sympathetic character.
